query:
SELECT tm.id, tm.title, tm.order_index, LENGTH(tm.content) as content_length
FROM training_modules tm
JOIN training_modules c ON tm.course_id = c.id
WHERE c.title LIKE '%NIST%'
ORDER BY tm.order_index
LIMIT 10;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VC7xi4RHX81jG7.65112bc774d1 --database K34VNBtbDJyjtW8qhrCBdB --execute SELECT tm.id, tm.title, tm.order_index, LENGTH(tm.content) as content_length
FROM training_modules tm
JOIN training_modules c ON tm.course_id = c.id
WHERE c.title LIKE '%NIST%'
ORDER BY tm.order_index
LIMIT 10;
